content.text: create a cozy coffee shop website for Bean There Cafe with full menu including drinks, pastries, and prices, online ordering with pickup times, loyalty program with points system, multiple store locations with hours, barista profiles with coffee expertise, coffee education blog, event calendar, catering services, gift card sales, and Instagram feed integration

Creating a complete multi-page cozy coffee shop website called "Bean There Cafe" with the following features:

1. Home page with welcoming hero section and brief intro.
2. Full menu page listing drinks, pastries with prices.
3. Online ordering page with pickup time selection and order form.
4. Loyalty program page explaining points system and user interface to track points.
5. Locations page showing multiple store locations with hours.
6. Baristas page with profiles and coffee expertise.
7. Blog page for coffee education articles.
8. Events page with an interactive calendar.
9. Catering services page with form and info.
10. Gift cards page with purchase option.
11. Instagram feed integration on home page.

All pages will have consistent styling using Tailwind CSS with a cozy warm color palette (brown, cream, orange accents). 

A subtle small rounded pill in bottom right corner linking to Odoe Studio as branding.

Navigation menu included on all pages for smooth navigation.

Separate files for HTML, CSS, and JS, no frameworks.

Using vanilla JS for online ordering, loyalty points tracking (in localStorage), event calendar interactivity, Instagram feed fetching (simulated since no backend).

File structure will have multiple HTML pages and css and js folders for organization.

Building a fully professional, beautiful, modern UI with appropriate icons from Font Awesome.

Port is null since static website.

content.text: make it support mobil also the navabr support mobil as wlel

Creating a complete multi-page cozy coffee shop website named 'Bean There Cafe' with all requested features. Each page will be fully responsive using Tailwind CSS with a mobile-friendly hamburger menu navigation. The navbar will transform into a hamburger menu on small screens with smooth toggle animations. The website will have a warm cozy color palette and use Font Awesome icons for visual appeal. The loyalty program will use localStorage to track points. The event calendar will be interactive with date highlights. Instagram feed integration will be simulated with placeholders since no real API keys are used. The site will have a subtle small rounded pill in the bottom right linking to Odoe Studio. The project will have separate HTML, CSS, and JS files organized for clarity. Navigation will be consistent across all pages with clear calls to action and hover effects. The site will be tested for perfect responsiveness from mobile to desktop.

The website will have a warm cozy color palette and use Font Awesome icons for visual appeal. The loyalty program will use localStorage to track points. The event calendar will be interactive with date highlights. Instagram feed integration will be simulated with placeholders since no real API keys are used. The site will have a subtle small rounded pill in the bottom right linking to Odoe Studio. The project will have separate HTML, CSS, and JS files organized for clarity.
